title: have you ever hear of the baseball team called nashville vols.
author: soundfan96

posts.post_title: have you ever hear of the baseball team called nashville vols.
posts.post_content: have you ever hear of the miner lleague team called nashville vols
Yes.  Short for Volunteers.  Team from 1901-1963...officially "the Vols" starting in 1908.  I would recommend sticking this in a different thread category though, not on the buy/sell/trade section...
